entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
